title: Strengthening Practical Machine Learning Competencies: Enhancing Mathematical Skills through Cinematic Meditation and Digital Reading

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Students can write a critical reflective essay of over 800 characters on the development of mathematical skills after watching cinematic meditation videos.
Using online textbooks, learners can perform self-directed learning for at least five hours per week per person and maintain a 90%+ record in learning logs.
Through project-based learning, teams can complete mathematical modeling outcomes and achieve 85+ points (out of 100) in presentation evaluations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
